item.title: Political Science 553: Introductory Statistical Computing for Political Science
item.description: Part One Slide Title Here is some stuff! bullet another bullet Math for some basic modeling concepts OLS model: \(\begin{align} y_{i} &= \alpha + \beta x_{i} + \varepsilon_{i}\end{align}\) Residual sum of squares: \(\begin{align} \sum\limits_{i}^{N} \varepsilon_{i} &= \sum\limits_{i}^{N} \left( y_{i} - \alpha - \beta x_{i} \right) \end{align}\)
